Description: Small glass amulet of a bird. A cylindrical hole runs horizontally through where the birds wings would have been. On the left side, the wing is not shown, on the right side the wing is broken off. The head is very small. Whitish glass with several lines of different thickness in a light blue colour along the body.
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 235)
